metadata.title: CVE-2019-12300 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Buildbot before 1.8.2 and 2.x before 2.3.1 accepts a user-submittedauthorization token from OAuth and uses it to authenticate a user. If anattacker has a token allowing them to read the user details of a victim,they can login as the victim.

criterions.comment: buildbot: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
